articles.title: Russia says EU is becoming a vassal of NATO - Reuters
articles.description: Russia said on Wednesday that the European Union was becoming a vassal of NATO, citing the signing of a joint declaration in which the two organisations pledged to deepen their cooperation in response to Russia's war in Ukraine.

articles.title: As mpox quickly fades in the US, observers wonder who deserves the credit? - Omineca Express

articles.title: Virgin Orbit scrambles to establish why first UK satellite launch failed - Financial Times
articles.description: Very public blow to British ambitions to be player in Europe’s ‘space race’
articles.content:
Sir Richard Bransons Virgin Orbit was scrambling on Tuesday to untangle the causes of its failed attempt to put satellites into orbit from Cornwall in south-west England.
